theme_strategy.customer_view: Light Mode (The Atelier) - Focus on clarity, trust, and product detail. Backgrounds are soft creams and whites.
theme_strategy.admin_view: Dark Mode (The Vault) - Focus on data density, reduced eye strain, and 'Control Center' aesthetic. Backgrounds are deep sapphire and charcoal.

rules.headings: Use Playfair Display. Tracking: tight (-0.02em). Line-height: 1.1.
rules.overline: Use Manrope Uppercase. Tracking: wide (0.15em). Color: Gold or Muted Blue.
rules.prices: Use Manrope. Font-feature-settings: 'tnum' (Tabular numbers) for alignment.
rules.contrast: Never use pure black text. Use #0F1F38 (Deep Sapphire) or #1A1A1A (Charcoal).

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts: Playfair Display (400,500,600,700), Manrope (300,400,500,600), Cinzel (400,500)

ui_components.global_radius: 0px (Sharp) or 2px (Micro-rounded) - No pill shapes except buttons

buttons.primary: Solid Deep Sapphire bg, White text. Sharp corners or slightly rounded (2px). Hover: Lift + Gold Border.
buttons.secondary: Transparent bg, Deep Sapphire border. Text Deep Sapphire.
buttons.accent: Solid Gold bg, White text. Use sparingly for 'Add to Cart'.

cards.product_card: Minimal. No border, no shadow initially. Image aspect ratio: 3:4 (Portrait). Hover: Image zoom + slight shadow.

inputs.style: Underline only or Minimal Border. Background: Transparent. Border-bottom: 1px solid #E2E8F0. Focus: Border-bottom Color Gold.

grid_system.bento_grid: Use for Collections. Mix col-span-2 row-span-2 (Hero) with col-span-1 (Detail).

assets.logo_text: Use 'Cinzel' font for the text logo 'House of Neelam'.

customer_app_guidelines.navigation: Centered Logo. Links split Left/Right. Minimal. Transparent header on Hero, Solid White on scroll.
customer_app_guidelines.product_detail_page: Split screen. Left: Sticky Gallery (Vertical Scroll). Right: Sticky Content. Minimal Accordions for details.
customer_app_guidelines.cart_drawer: Slide-in from right. Clean, minimal, 'Review Order' focused.
customer_app_guidelines.checkout: Distraction-free. Remove header navigation. Single column layout.

admin_panel_guidelines.layout: Sidebar Navigation (Collapsible). Top Header for Search/Profile.
admin_panel_guidelines.dashboard_widgets: Use 'Card' component with dark background. Numbers in Large Manrope font. Trends in Green/Red.
admin_panel_guidelines.tables: Dense. Row height 48px. Alternating row colors (very subtle). Actions column pinned right.
admin_panel_guidelines.forms: Split into sections (Basic Info, Pricing, Inventory, Media). Use Tabs for complex products.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts without purpose.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid, high contrast.
Buttons: Use 'pill' shape only for primary Call-to-Actions, otherwise use sharp rectangles.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly (0.98) on click.
Images: ALWAYS use aspect-ratio classes (aspect-[3/4] for products). Object-cover.
Data-Test-IDs: Every interactive element must have a data-testid attribute.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers and modals, but keep opacity high (90%) for legibility.
Shadows: Use 'shadow-xl' for floating elements, but 'shadow-none' for cards inside grids.
instructions_to_main_agent: Configure Tailwind with the Sapphire & Gold palette.
Set up the font imports in index.css.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Customer vs Admin theme switching.
Use the provided image URLs for seeding the database or static display.
